translations.15: ˹At least˺ for ˹the favour of˺ making Quraysh habitually secure—

words.translation: Their familiarity|(with the) journey|(of) winter|and summer

translations.15: secure in their trading caravan ˹to Yemen˺ in the winter and ˹Syria˺ in the summer—

words.translation: So let them worship|(the) Lord|(of) this|House

translations.15: let them worship the Lord of this ˹Sacred˺ House

words.translation: The One Who|feeds them|against|hunger|and gives them security|against|fear

translations.1: Allazeee at'amahum min joo'inw wa-aamanahum min khawf
translations.15: Who has fed them against hunger and made them secure against fear
